taskbody.context: Besides the example project that comes with the EasyTrac package you will need to create your own projects to manage your documentation.

step.cmd: Open a Windows command line and go to the C:\dita-op folder.

Type the
addproject projname
command where projname is the name of the project you want to create.

taskbody.result: Once the new project is created, the associated Subversion repository is accessible at http://localhost:8181/svn/projname and the Trac project is accessible at http://localhost:8181/projects/projname
